li.label: pregnancy mood collapse
li.description: This pregnancy is so hard. My body always feels awful. So exhausting!

li.label: pregnancy mood down
li.description: It feels like everything is going wrong for me today. Pregnancy is tough.

li.label: pregnancy mood up
li.description: Everything feels a little bit more pleasant today. Pregnancy is nice.

li.label: pregnancy mood high
li.description: I feel amazing! Being pregnant is a gift!

li.label: kill thirst
li.description: Must kill... it has been too long since I have killed somebody up close and personal.

li.label: sunlight sensitivity
li.description: The sun hurts my eyes and my skin is tingling unpleasantly.

li.label: sunlight sensitivity
li.description: The sunlight burns my eyes and my skin feels like it's being scorched.

li.label: genetic chemical dependency
li.description: I need {CHEMICAL_label} because of my genetic deficiency. But it's been so long since I've had any.

li.label: scanning sickness
li.description: Ever since that scan I've been dizzy and I can't think.

li.label: deathrest exhaustion
li.description: The casket calls and I fall weary. The world's pall makes all so dreary. I need to deathrest.

li.label: apocriton hatred (intense)
li.description: I feel its hatred inside me, the way I feel my own emotions. It's so close and so cold. They all deserve death.

li.label: apocriton hatred (strong)
li.description: I hear its hatred echoing between my thoughts. Reasons, always reasons why my friends ought to die.

li.label: apocriton hatred (distant)
li.description: I feel it out there somewhere. It's always thinking about why these people deserve death. Always following the logic of murder. Hard to ignore.

li.label: acidic smog
li.description: The smog makes my eyes water and it smells awful. I wish I could just have a few fresh breaths.

li.label: recluse alone
li.description: It's a relief not to have to think about other people.

li.label: recluse in small group
li.description: I'm happy I don't have too many people to think about. Alone would be better, but this is good too.

li.label: recluse crowded
li.description: There's too many people around here. The weight of having to think about them bears down on me.

li.label: recluse very crowded
li.description: There are so many people I'm supposed to be working with. They're overwhelming.

li.label: childlike joy
li.description: New! Fun! Pretty! Oooh!

li.label: childlike wonder
li.description: The world is a magical place and I can't wait to grow up!

li.label: childlike enthusiasm
li.description: The world is full of wonders.

li.label: childlike confidence
li.description: There are so many interesting things to learn.

li.label: new pregnancy
li.description: I'm pregnant! It makes me happy.

li.label: new pregnancy
li.description: I'm pregnant and not very happy about it.

li.label: psychic bond
li.description: The bond brings us together, sharing feelings and thoughts. It's like a friend who is always with me.

li.label: psychic bond distance
li.description: The distance makes it so hard to hear. I feel alone, like standing in a dark, silent cavern.

li.label: deathrested outside
li.description: I had to deathrest outdoors. It was awful.

li.label: awful deathrest chamber
li.description: I had to deathrest in an awful chamber.

li.label: decent deathrest chamber
li.description: I deathrested in a decent chamber.

li.label: good deathrest chamber
li.description: I deathrested in a slightly impressive chamber. It was nice.

li.label: great deathrest chamber
li.description: I deathrested in an impressive chamber. I feel rejuvenated.

li.label: excellent deathrest chamber
li.description: I deathrested in a very impressive chamber. I feel amazing.

li.label: exceptional deathrest chamber
li.description: I deathrested in an extremely impressive chamber. It was glorious.

li.label: unbelievable deathrest chamber
li.description: I deathrested in an unbelievably impressive chamber. It was spectacular.

li.label: wondrous deathrest chamber
li.description: I deathrested in such a luxurious chamber! It was wondrous.

li.label: blood torch
li.description: No flame burns as softly as a blood torch.

li.label: hemogen craving
li.description: My bones ache. I really need hemogen.

li.label: hemogen craving
li.description: This hurts bad and my head is fuzzy. I would kill for some blood. Maybe I should.

li.label: hemogen craving
li.description: Can't think. Thirst. Thirst. Must. Have. Blood.
